UI_visible_response: Read 15 web pagesView Page DetailsIn 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in southwest China's Chongqing Municipality experienced a tragic accident on September 27. A fire broke out on a conveyor belt, which led to the release of excessive levels of carbon monoxide. This trapped 17 workers underground. Tragically, 16 of them died due to carbon monoxide poisoning, while one survivor was rescued and sent to the hospital. The cause of the accident is still under investigation.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in southwest China's Chongqing Municipality experienced a tragic accident on September 27. A fire broke out on a conveyor belt, which led to the release of excessive levels of carbon monoxide[^1^][^3^][^10^]. This trapped 17 workers underground[^3^][^10^]. Tragically, 16 of them died due to carbon monoxide poisoning, while one survivor was rescued and sent to the hospital[^1^][^3^][^10^]. The cause of the accident is still under investigation[^10^].
